Literature.Title: Lentivirus-derived antimicrobial peptides: increased potency by sequence engineering and dimerization
Literature.Author: Tencza SB, Creighton DJ, Yuan T, Vogel HJ, Montelaro RC, Mietzner TA

Literature.Title: Selective toxicity of engineered lentivirus lytic peptides in a CF airway cell model.
Literature.Author: Phadke SM, Islam K, Deslouches B, Kapoor SA, Beer Stolz D, Watkins SC, Montelaro RC, Pilewski JM, Mietzner TA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=16 µM,Human cystic fibrosis airway epithelial cells:-=NA
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=8-16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=1-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MBC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=>=64µM),Serratia marcescens 646(MBC=1-2µM),Serratia marcescens 231(MBC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=0.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1244(MBC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1244(MBC=1µM)
